title: Color Saturation and Brightness
description: Learn about color saturation and brightness properties

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Saturation and brightness are two important color properties that determine its appearance and perception.

saturation.title: Saturation
saturation.description: Saturation determines the intensity or purity of a color. High saturation means bright, pure color, while low means muted, grayish.

brightness.title: Brightness
brightness.description: Brightness determines how light or dark a color is. High brightness means light color, while low means dark.

combination.title: Combining Properties
combination.content: By combining different levels of saturation and brightness, you can create a wide range of color variations and moods. This allows creating complex and expressive color palettes.
